## [Table](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table)

### Methods

|                                                                   Method                                                                    |                                            Return type                                             |                                                                                          Brief description                                                                                           |
|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [appendTableRow()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#appendTableRow())                                     | [TableRow](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-row)                 | Creates and appends a new [TableRow](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-row).                                                                                        |
| [appendTableRow(tableRow)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#appendTableRow(TableRow))                     | [TableRow](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-row)                 | Appends the given [TableRow](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-row).                                                                                                |
| [clear()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#clear())                                                       | [Table](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table)                        | Clears the contents of the element.                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [copy()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#copy())                                                         | [Table](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table)                        | Returns a detached, deep copy of the current element.                                                                                                                                                |
| [editAsText()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#editAsText())                                             | [Text](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/text)                          | Obtains a [Text](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/text) version of the current element, for editing.                                                                     |
| [findElement(elementType)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#findElement(ElementType))                     | [RangeElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-element)         | Searches the contents of the element for a descendant of the specified type.                                                                                                                         |
| [findElement(elementType, from)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#findElement(ElementType,RangeElement))  | [RangeElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-element)         | Searches the contents of the element for a descendant of the specified type, starting from the specified [RangeElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-element). |
| [findText(searchPattern)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#findText(String))                              | [RangeElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-element)         | Searches the contents of the element for the specified text pattern using regular expressions.                                                                                                       |
| [findText(searchPattern, from)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#findText(String,RangeElement))           | [RangeElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/range-element)         | Searches the contents of the element for the specified text pattern, starting from a given search result.                                                                                            |
| [getAttributes()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#getAttributes())                                       | `Object`                                                                                           | Retrieves the element's attributes.                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [getBorderColor()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#getBorderColor())                                     | `String`                                                                                           | Retrieves the border color.                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [getBorderWidth()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#getBorderWidth())                                     | `Number`                                                                                           | Retrieves the border width, in points.                                                                                                                                                               |
| [getCell(rowIndex, cellIndex)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#getCell(Integer,Integer))                 | [TableCell](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-cell)               | Retrieves the [TableCell](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-cell) at the specified row and cell indices.                                                            |
| [getChild(childIndex)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#getChild(Integer))                                | [Element](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element)                    | Retrieves the child element at the specified child index.                                                                                                                                            |
| [getChildIndex(child)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#getChildIndex(Element))                           | `Integer`                                                                                          | Retrieves the child index for the specified child element.                                                                                                                                           |
| [getColumnWidth(columnIndex)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#getColumnWidth(Integer))                   | `Number`                                                                                           | Retrieves the width of the specified table column, in points.                                                                                                                                        |
| [getLinkUrl()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#getLinkUrl())                                             | `String`                                                                                           | Retrieves the link url.                                                                                                                                                                              |
| [getNextSibling()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#getNextSibling())                                     | [Element](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element)                    | Retrieves the element's next sibling element.                                                                                                                                                        |
| [getNumChildren()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#getNumChildren())                                     | `Integer`                                                                                          | Retrieves the number of children.                                                                                                                                                                    |
| [getNumRows()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#getNumRows())                                             | `Integer`                                                                                          | Retrieves the number of [TableRows](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-row).                                                                                         |
| [getParent()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#getParent())                                               | [ContainerElement](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/container-element) | Retrieves the element's parent element.                                                                                                                                                              |
| [getPreviousSibling()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#getPreviousSibling())                             | [Element](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element)                    | Retrieves the element's previous sibling element.                                                                                                                                                    |
| [getRow(rowIndex)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#getRow(Integer))                                      | [TableRow](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-row)                 | Retrieves the [TableRow](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-row) at the specified row index.                                                                         |
| [getText()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#getText())                                                   | `String`                                                                                           | Retrieves the contents of the element as a text string.                                                                                                                                              |
| [getTextAlignment()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#getTextAlignment())                                 | [TextAlignment](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/text-alignment)       | Gets the text alignment.                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [getType()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#getType())                                                   | [ElementType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element-type)           | Retrieves the element's [ElementType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element-type).                                                                                    |
| [insertTableRow(childIndex)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#insertTableRow(Integer))                    | [TableRow](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-row)                 | Creates and inserts a new [TableRow](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-row) at the specified index.                                                                 |
| [insertTableRow(childIndex, tableRow)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#insertTableRow(Integer,TableRow)) | [TableRow](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-row)                 | Inserts the given [TableRow](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-row) at the specified index.                                                                         |
| [isAtDocumentEnd()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#isAtDocumentEnd())                                   | `Boolean`                                                                                          | Determines whether the element is at the end of the [Document](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/document).                                                               |
| [removeChild(child)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#removeChild(Element))                               | [Table](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table)                        | Removes the specified child element.                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [removeFromParent()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#removeFromParent())                                 | [Table](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table)                        | Removes the element from its parent.                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [removeRow(rowIndex)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#removeRow(Integer))                                | [TableRow](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-row)                 | Removes the [TableRow](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table-row) at the specified row index.                                                                           |
| [replaceText(searchPattern, replacement)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#replaceText(String,String))    | [Element](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/element)                    | Replaces all occurrences of a given text pattern with a given replacement string, using regular expressions.                                                                                         |
| [setAttributes(attributes)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#setAttributes(Object))                       | [Table](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table)                        | Sets the element's attributes.                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [setBorderColor(color)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#setBorderColor(String))                          | [Table](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table)                        | Sets the border color.                                                                                                                                                                               |
| [setBorderWidth(width)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#setBorderWidth(Number))                          | [Table](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table)                        | Sets the border width, in points.                                                                                                                                                                    |
| [setColumnWidth(columnIndex, width)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#setColumnWidth(Integer,Number))     | [Table](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table)                        | Sets the width of the specified column, in points.                                                                                                                                                   |
| [setLinkUrl(url)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#setLinkUrl(String))                                    | [Table](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table)                        | Sets the link url.                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| [setTextAlignment(textAlignment)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table#setTextAlignment(TextAlignment))       | [Table](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/document/table)                        | Sets the text alignment.                                                                                                                                                                             |
